title: Stones River National Battlefield: Join Our Friends
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park     Join Our Friends              Join Our Friends       The Friends of Stones River National Battlefield are an important partner of the National Park Service. They are a tax-exempt, non-profit corporation that supports preservation and education issues that relate to the battlefield and are often a source of financial and volunteer assistance. Mailing Address: P.O. Box 4092 Murfreesboro, TN 37133-4092 Visit the Friends of Stones River Website  Â    ADDITIONAL ORGANIZATIONS THAT SUPPORT OUR MISSION Heritage Partnership of Rutherford County Middle Tennessee Civil War Round Table Tennessee Civil War Preservation Association
